title: Meditation crystal
description: Meditation crystals were naturally-occurring rocks that assisted in inducing meditation. Growing naturally on the Deep Core world, Tython, slivers of a meditation crystal could be placed inside the hilt of a lightsaber to produce a coherent beam of energy, as well as assist the wielder to stay in closer connection to the Force during combat. This enhanced connection allowed the user to retain energy while fighting rather than losing it. Jedi Master Rahm Kota gave two of these crystals to a clone
cleaned_text: Meditation crystals were naturally-occurring rocks that assisted in inducing [meditation](/wiki/Meditation/Legends). Growing naturally on the [Deep Core](/wiki/Deep_Core/Legends) [world](/wiki/Planet/Legends), [Tython](/wiki/Tython/Legends), slivers of a meditation [crystal](/wiki/Crystal/Legends) could be placed inside the [hilt](/wiki/Lightsaber_hilt/Legends) of a [lightsaber](/wiki/Lightsaber/Legends) to produce a coherent beam of energy, as well as assist the wielder to stay in closer connection to [the Force](/wiki/The_Force/Legends) during [combat](/wiki/Lightsaber_combat/Legends). This enhanced connection allowed the user to retain energy while fighting rather than losing it. [Jedi Master](/wiki/Jedi_Master/Legends) [Rahm Kota](/wiki/Rahm_Kota/Legends) gave two of these [clone](/wiki/Subject_1138) of former [Sith apprentice](/wiki/Sith_apprentice/Legends) [Galen Marek](/wiki/Galen_Marek) on the way to the [Salvation](/wiki/Salvation_(flagship)). Behind the scenes[ ] In [The Force Unleashed II](/wiki/Star_Wars:_The_Force_Unleashed_II), these crystals are used by Marek for the majority of his adventure, and allowed him to regain force energy every time he struck an opponent. Despite Marek appearing with two of these crystals in cutscenes as early as [Dagobah](/wiki/Dagobah/Legends), it is impossible to obtain more than one in-game before reaching the [Salvation](/wiki/Salvation_(flagship))—though, according to the novel, the crystals are only blue on Dagobah during his vision, and he still had red-bladed weapons at the time. He received the Meditation crystals on the way to the Salvation in the novel, while in-game he acquires the second crystal around halfway through the Salvation.
